Description: Part of an open-work green glazed composition composite sceptre combining an ankh, a djed-pillar and a was-sceptre, all above a neb-basket hieroglyph. Fine detail shown, including the eyes on the head of the was-sceptre. Glaze largely faded to dull white. Repaired break at the base of the djed-pillar and another in the neb-hieroglyph.
